00066     public static function htmlKitchenSinkDiv(array $attrs = array()) {
00067         $div = new Boo_Html_Div;
00068         $div->applyAttrs($attrs);
00069         
00070         $tmp = '<h1>Heading Level 1</h1><h2>Heading Level 2</h2><h3>Heading Level 3</h3>'
00071             . '<h4>Heading Level 4</h4><h5>Heading Level 5</h5><h6>Heading Level 6</h6>';
00072             
00073         $tmp .= Boo_LoremIpsum::htmlPs(3);
00074         $tmp .= Boo_LoremIpsum::htmlUl(5);
00075         
00076         $div->setContent($tmp);
00077         return $div;
00078     }
